(2) A minimum of 'O' level credit passes in six (6) subjects including English   Language, Mathematics and subjects relevant to the candidate’s chosen  
 programme in the Academy  at not more than two (2) sittings.  
(3) Candidates must also obtain satisfactory scores in both the written   examination and the interview and must pass rigorous physical and  
 psychological tests of fitness.  
 (4)    
 2.2.40  SAMUEL ADEGBOYEGA UNIVERSITY, OGWA, EDO STATE    
    
   UTME  
  
Five (5) 'O' level credit passes including English Language for all programmes; Mathematics for programmes in the College of Basic and Applied Sciences as well 
as College of Management and Social Sciences at not more than two (2) sittings.  
   DIRECT ENTRY  
  
In addition to the above requirements, candidates must have one of the following:  
i. ‘A’ level passes in two (2) relevant subjects.  
ii. ND  at credit level from a recognised Polytechnic iii.  NCE at merit level from a recognised College 
of Education  
  
  
 2.2.41  RHEMA UNIVERSITY, ABA  
      
   UTME  
  
Five (5) 'O' level credit passes at not more than two (2) sittings to include English Language, Mathematics and other three ( 3) relevant subjects  
   DIRECT ENTRY  
  
i. ND/HND in relevant programmes.  
ii. NCE with at least merit pass in the relevant subjects/programmes. iii.  Two (2) A’ level passes in 
the relevant subjects.  
 2.2.42  ONDO STATE UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY, OKITIPUPA
